value.0: Woe, woe is me!
Oh, thank you! Will she help me?

*The girl in the cell is silent for a long moment.*

Did she say anything else?

*She stretches one grimy, scratched arm through the window bars. Her nails are bloody and cracked, her skin covered with scabbed cuts. Her battered fingers open slowly to take the potion from you, then her hand disappear back inside.*

Thank you. Please tell her I love her too.
Oh, woe is me!
Have you any news from my mother?
Oh, woe is me!
Have you any news from my mother?
Oh, woe is me!
Have you any news from my mother?
Oh, woe is me!

*A pair of filthy hands reaches up from inside and clasps the bars. Dimly, inside, you see the bruised face of a young woman, hair matted with filth, straw and blood.*

Yes, yes I am! Oh, thank the gods! You must help me! The Everwatch Knights are holding me prisoner!
They thought I knew something about the Luskans.

You know, the ones who invaded us years ago from the mainland? They still attack our ships now and then, I'm told. But the Knights think they're planning a new invasion, and anyone they suspect is brought here. But I don't know anything about any of that!
The Knights questioned me and found out I didn't know anything, and they went away. But then the jailers came and... did horrible things to me!

They take us from our cell, and strap us to tables. They put needles in us and... they drain out our blood! Pails full of it! And after a few days, when there's nothing left to give... they just take the bodies away somewhere...
I don't know, and they don't say. Please help me! I don't want to die!

Thank you! Thank you so much.... 

*The hands drop from the window bars. There is a faint sound of weeping from within as you turn away.*
Oh, woe is me!

*A pair of filthy hands reaches up from inside and clasps the bars. Dimly, inside, you see the bruised face of a young woman, hair matted with filth, straw and blood.*

You must help me! The Everwatch Knights are holding me prisoner! They think I'm working for the Luskans!

You know, the ones who invaded us years ago from the mainland? They still attack our ships now and then, I'm told. But the Everwatch Knights think they're planning a new invasion. Anyone they suspect is brought here, but I don't know anything.
Tell my mother! She lives in a house along the North Road, just outside of Osthavn. Maybe she can help me!.
Miss, I'm back! I spoke to your mother.
She gave me this potion to give to you. I don't know what it does, but she said it would 'release you from your prison and your pain'.
She said she loves you.
I will. Goodbye...
Hello?
I've done what she asked me to do in the swamp and I'm on my way back there as soon as I can. Please try to hold on a little longer.
Hello?
Yes. I spoke to her, and she has sent me to the swamps to make a potion for you. I don't know anything more than that, but I'll be back as soon as I can.
Hello?
Soon. Please try to hang on a bit longer.
Hello? I'm looking for the daughter of the woman who lives by the North Road. Are you her?
Why are they holding you?
The Luskans?
Won't they release you, then?
What did they do?
Why on earth do they do that?
I'll go back and tell your mother right away. Maybe she can think of something.
I'll be back as soon as I can.
What's wrong?
The Luskans?
What can I do about that?
I'll see what I can do for you.
